ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Transfer Gate 1
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Enter the next level through the Transfer Gate. (Cannot return)

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Trap 1
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Oops! Injured by a giant rock, you lost some Holy STA.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Trap 2
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Oops! Injured by a giant rock, you lost some Holy STA.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Longinus' Gun
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Longinus' Gun Active Skill: Eliminate an discovered mob with the highest HP without consuming Holy STA.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Holy Light
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Holy Light Active Skill: Recovers 50% of lost Holy STA.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Judgment
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Judgment Active Skill: Halves all discovered mobs' HP.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Deep Gaze
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Deep Gaze Active Skill: Removes the fog above all existing potions and chests so that they can be seen.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Holy Ring
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Holy Ring Active Skill: A teleport will appear after defeating a mob next time.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Mandrake
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Mandrake Passive Skill: Recovers an extra 2 Holy STA every time you pick up a potion.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Praying
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Praying Passive Skill: 25% chance to recover 1 Holy STA every time you remove fog.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Dendrobium
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Dendrobium Passive Skill: Raises Holy STA capacity by 20%.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Cornucopia
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Cornucopia Passive Skill: Recovers 5 Holy STA every time you pass through a teleport gate.

ExploreEventTemplate.Name: Bathsheba's Treasure
ExploreEventTemplate.Desc: Bathsheba's Treasure Passive Skill: 25% chance to receive double rewards every time you defeat a mob or open a chest.
